string.value: The Maple Administrator says that she has something to tell you.

You should take the Maple Administrator's advice and talk to Gwin, who started his adventures alongside the very first adventurers in Maple World. Take 1 #bDrake's Blood#k and #bgo see Gwin#k who is somewhere in Victoria's Central Dungeon.
Gwin, who was one of the first adventurers in Maple World, has yet to stop adventuring. You gave him a Drake's Blood and received his tale in return.

It's been tough collecting the tales I've requested, hasn't it? Let me inform you of one thing that might help you, #h0#. Maple World is filled with experienced heroes and they have more stories to tell than anyone else in the world.
Tales you acquire from them will be extremely valuable. How about finding #bGwin#k, who has set out to travel the central dungeon of Victoria?

Gwin went on a new adventure to the central dungeon of Victoria but has not yet returned. He must be running out of items by now... Will you take him #b1 Drake's Blood#k and show your support, #h0#? Surely, it would help him a lot.
It would be helpful to hear Gwin's tales.
Ah... Is this the end...?#b\r\n#L0#Are you alright, Gwin?#l
Who's there? This is a dangerous place... #b\r\n#L0#I've traveled far just to hear your stories.#l
My tales...? Meh... Look at me, I'm pathetic. I've run of out items.#b\r\n#L0#I've brought some things for you.#l

Oh, this is Drake's Blood! With this item, I'll be able to survive here for at least a month! Thank you. Did you say you've come to hear my stories? I can't talk long since I haven't found what I'm here to find, but I'll give you this. This is my documentation of everything that has happened to me.
I better power up! My adventure hasn't come to an end yet.
Find Gwin, who has embarked on an adventure in the central dungeon of Victoria Island.
Ah, I've run out of items... It would be great if I just had 1 #bDrake's Blood#k...
